verses.name: Numbers 31:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 31:2
verses.text: Avenge the children of Israel of the Midianites: afterward shalt thou be gathered unto thy people.

verses.name: Numbers 31:3
verses.text: And Moses spake unto the people, saying, Arm some of yourselves unto the war, and let them go against the Midianites, and avenge the Lord of Midian.

verses.name: Numbers 31:4
verses.text: Of every tribe a thousand, throughout all the tribes of Israel, shall ye send to the war.

verses.name: Numbers 31:5
verses.text: So there were delivered out of the thousands of Israel, a thousand of every tribe, twelve thousand armed for war.
